action.action-desc: Mr. Husted (for himself, Ms. Blunt Rochester, and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to encourage States to develop academic standards for elementary school and secondary school for artificial intelligence and other emerging technologies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Recommending Artificial Intelligence Standards in Education Act of 2025 or the RAISE Act of 2025.

section.header: Academic standards for artificial intelligence and technology education
section.text: Section 1111(b)(1)(C) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 6311(b)(1)(C)) is amended by inserting , including standards for artificial intelligence and other emerging technologies after by the State.
